tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE manufacturing_equipment_energy_data (
    equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    date_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Equipment_Maintenance (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_cost DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment_Usage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  usage_duration INT,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Manufacturing_Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id UUID REFERENCES manufacturing_equipment (equipment_id),
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);
